title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 3.34 - Modification of dairy farms, milk plants and milk handling equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 3.34 - Modification of dairy farms, milk plants and milk handling equipment

State Regulations

Properly prepared plans for all milkhouses, milking
barns, stables and parlors, transfer stations, receiving stations and milk
plants regulated under this Part which are hereafter constructed, reconstructed
or extensively altered, shall be submitted to the commissioner for written
approval before work is begun. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
3.34

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
